cause.description:
This cause is basically here to help get people more aware and involved with diseases and conditions that are taking place around the world. HIV/AIDS is a huge issue especially in countries in Africa, and many more around the world. Children everyday are being born with this disease, and no medicare is being provided to help these kids, even adults. You can help to show you care, just join!
1. Medical Attention should be awarded to all people who are in need, despite health care
2. Countries and people should be more involved and aware of these conditions around the world
cause.mission: Help people get more involved with helping people with life threatening conditions
cause.name: Help People with HIV/AIDS
